Alright Frank ...were you recording this one while in the nude!!?? LOL  Great recordings!  Its amazing even with foreign language they are able to use it and pick out and transmit the words and stuff in the English language.
   
  Rhonda

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
          These are from using an oriental station as raw audio tonight. I tune in a shortwave station, announce I'm doing an EVP recording, and start recording for maybe five minutes. 
 
 Frank-S
